description: Working at this organisation has awarded me valuable experience in the use of computer systems in the industry. I have had the opportunity to develop software to optimise workflows including ingesting and parsing bank statements, managing sensitive customer information, and updating critical internal databases with the most up-to-date knowledge.
Overseeing all main operations along with the organisation and development of all software, websites and infrastructure.
Work experience in an accountancy office where I improved my communication, organisation and time management skills.
